EmailTemplate.subject: Besting the VDI IO Blender | VMT Claims VMworld Prize | turboticker September 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo Bests 200 Vendors for Finalist Award:
<http://vmturbo.com/press-releases/vmturbo-wins-best-vmworld-award-virtualization-management/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=091714> FREE Topology Stencils Are Here Organize your topology map with these beautiful, HD datacenter stencils <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=091714> for Microsoft Visio® and OmniGraffle.
Physical hosts, virtual hosts, VDI clusters, and storage all in brilliant detail and 100% FREE. Something missing? Join The Green Circle Community <http://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=091714> and request additional stencils! Blog: Did the I/O Blender Kill Your VDI Project? <http://vmturbo.com/blog/pae/io-blender/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=091714>
Storage solutions have significantly advanced over the last few decades in terms of capacity and read/write speed. However, many of these solutions were designed for the physical world and did not take into account virtualization and a single datastore that is shared among hundreds of VMs performing concurrent read/writes... Video: Building the Tribune Public Cloud <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmworld-vbrownbag-technical-tribune-private-cloud/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=091714>
At VMworld 2014, we joined Tribune Publishing in giving a technical presentation discussing the Private Cloud infrastructure Tribune was building and managing with the help of VMTurbo’s Software-Driven Control. Here’s the re-broadcast of the presentation. Recorded Webcast: Public, Private, & Hybrid - Lessons for Scaling from Leading Cloud Provider Peak 10 <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-public-private-hybrid-cloud-lessons-for-scaling-peak-10/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=091714>
Public, Private, & Hybrid: Lessons for Scaling from a Leading Cloud Provider covers Peak 10’s amazing story of rapid growth, and the role VMTurbo played in the process. The World's Only Unified Software-Driven Control System | VMTurbo, Inc.® 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
